website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality wedge for babies who are dealing with acid reflux.
pros: The wedge is made from the highest quality material, which makes it sturdy, firm, comfortable, and safe for children and adults of all ages
Its hypoallergenic bamboo cotton removal cover, memory foam wedge pillow, and waterproof lining all have no toxic chemicals
cons: The foam is much harder than some would like

customer_reviews.title: The incline is just right for our baby
customer_reviews.text: The width of the wedge is not as wide as the crib but it works for us. Our baby has really bad reflux so he actually sleeps in a lounger now and we use this wedge when we have to lay him down for drying after a bath. It works great because my baby would smile and play while we dry him up. Without the wedge he would feel miserable and after a few minutes he would have bug spit up. Once he is transitioned to the crib we would use this more.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough to reach both sides of crib, & leaves a gap.
customer_reviews.text: My baby had reflux so that is why I bought this. Its steep enough and firm which is good. But it leaves a gap in between wedge and side of crib about 10 inches or so, so baby could roll to the side where there is a gap and get stuck. I would have liked it better if the wedge were wider. However, it does say you can use it under the mattress for best results. I just would rather put it on the outside under the fitted sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Larry & Sara

customer_reviews.title: Rolls off
customer_reviews.text: It's a great pillow for my son but he wiggles and moves at night so she slips down and by middoof the night he is off and I have to fix him. I need the pillow but I hate how he pretty much rolls off.
customer_reviews.author: Tech City Digital Solutions

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be width-wise so there’s a gap between the crib and pillow. Will probably be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is exactly what I was looking for! It is super high quality and durable. It fit perfectly into the crib and so far seems to be doing its job. Very satisfied with this purchase and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: ange

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for nephew. Product came as advertised...super soft and high quality. Now hope everyone gets some much needed sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke W.

customer_reviews.title: it was recommended to me by a friend
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in the mail today, it was recommended to me by a friend, and I am really impressed with the quality. The cover is soft and the foam has the perfect firmness.
customer_reviews.author: Nima Jahanforouz

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT YOU WONT FIND ANOTHER PRODUCT LIKE THIS
customer_reviews.text: WAS EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED, PICTURE AS DESCRIBED, GREAT QUALITY AND WORTH THE PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie campos

customer_reviews.title: This is great !
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product ! Easy to use/straight to the point, and best of all its easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: but it is perfect for supporting the baby and not sinking it in
customer_reviews.text: The pillow and pillow cover are really high quality material and the foam is firm, but it is perfect for supporting the baby and not sinking it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Maybe could make a little wider. Like almost width of crib mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Escamilla

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Gas Relief
customer_reviews.text: Hi bought this because my son was having issues with gas. We found that when he was propped up, he could relieve himself more easily. I purchased this item in specific because it's narrow enough to fit in our Babyletto Origami Crib. If your baby doesn't move at all, this item could work.. however, my son would move and shift during the night and end up perpendicular to how he was originally positioned. Because of the incline, I was worried he would get stuck in a way that wouldn't allow him to breathe. I wanted to like this item, but I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow works great as intended under the crib mattress. It's the only one I've found that isn't flimsy. This definatley helped our baby girl and us get some sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this to use myself to elevate my head ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use myself to elevate my head at night. Please be aware that because this is used in a babies crib it is made with a very dense foam. There’s nothing wrong with this product just be aware of how hard it will be before you order it.
customer_reviews.author: Student of life

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies
customer_reviews.text: The cover is extremely soft. Pillow is is firm which is perfect for babies. I was worried about smell but this has none. I'm extremely pleased with this pillow and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Guys, if she wants a crib pillow just buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The wife insisted we needed it, and she wasn't wrong. The removable cover is nice for doing laundry and any small spills.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I had issues with my baby son at night when we would put him to sleep. The change in angle has helped him tremendously. He slept so well, my wife and I were able to get a good night sleep. Great product! Also, foun it helps with posture while sitting on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Our pediatrician recommended a pillow wedge to elevate the his head to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a Godsend! We've had some issues getting him to sleep throughout the night. Up until a few week ago we originally had him propped up on one end of the crib with blocks of wood but it wasn't enough. We still couldn't put him at an angle that was high enough to really help him. Our pediatrician recommended a pillow wedge to elevate the his head to help with not only sleeping but with gas, colic, and the occasional spit ups after feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Posture
customer_reviews.text: I've been so worried about the little things when it comes to my baby and when I came across this wedge shaped pillow I decided to try it... & let me just say! My baby has been sleeping so well ever since we've got the pillow and I feel like I have one less thing to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Nader

product_meta.title: BebeNapNap Universal Baby Crib Incline Acid Reflux Reducer Wedge Pillow, Memory Foam, Hypoallergenic Bamboo Cotton Removable Cover, Waterproof Lining, Infant Sleep Positioner
product_meta.description:
WHY ARE WE THE BEST?

 BEBENAPNAP is the HIGHEST QUALITY baby wedge acid reflux pillow on the market. BEBENAPNAP is the baby wedge pillow that was designed for RESULTS. Our 17-degree incline is designed to give your baby the perfect angle to rest comfortably and peacefully. Our HIGH-QUALITY MEMORY FORM is built with a lifespan that will outlast its use and is perfect to support your baby’s head, neck, and body comfortably. BEBENAPNAP comes with a TOP QUALITY Bamboo Cotton removable and machine washable cover that is made of thick material that will not fray or shrink no matter how many times you wash it! BEBENAPNAP baby wedge pillow also comes with a non-slip non-rip breathable WATERPROOF inner lining. This Waterproof cover protects the Memory Form baby wedge crib pillow from any spills or damage, but the breathe-able HIGH-QUALITY material will allow heat to escape and prevent a sweaty hot surface from being created. Our baby crib wedge pillow is HYPOALLERGENIC and NO TOXIC CHEMICALS that could harm your child. We have taken EXTREME CARE in designing a product that will last for years, to serve it’s purpose well, be comfortable and a pleasure to use, easy to clean and be safe for babies of all ages! 

SAFETY AND QUALITY FIRST

 BEBENAPNAP is crafted from top of the line HIGH-QUALITY HYPOALLERGENIC TOXIN FREE materials that are GUARANTEED to last for years! Most other baby wedge pillows, baby crib pillows, or acid reflux baby pillows designed for bassinets are made of low-grade materials that will not last!! BEBENAPNAP is HYPOALLERGENIC, TOXIN-FREE, AND BUILT TO LAST! BEBENAPNAP is the BEST acid reflux baby crib wedge pillow on the market!!
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY - Bebenapnap is the only acid reflux baby pillow, baby wedge pillow, or baby crib pillow that uses TOP QUALITY memory foam GUARANTEED to last for years! Other products use cheap material which makes them easy to fold or roll up and offer little to no support. Our memory foam baby wedge pillows are made from the highest quality material, which makes them sturdy, firm, comfortable, and safe for children and adults of all ages.

SAFE FOR ANY BABY - Place Wedge Pillow UNDER crib mattress for best results! Top quality hypoallergenic bamboo cotton removal cover, memory foam wedge pillow, and waterproof lining all have ABSOLUTELY NO toxic chemicals such as BPA's, PBDE’s, phthalates, formaldehyde, lead or any other hazards to your child's health.

COMFORT AND SUPPORT - HYPOALLERGENIC removal Bamboo Cotton cover is extremely soft, easy to remove and wash. Bebenapnap uses the best quality Memory Foam for added support. This is the ONLY baby acid reflux pillow that uses memory form, bamboo cotton, and has a non-rip waterproofing lining.

EASY TO CLEAN - Bebenapnap acid reflux baby crib wedge pillow comes with a high-quality bamboo cotton removable and machine washable cover. Memory Form is protected by a breathable toxin free waterproof lining that is easy to wipe clean using a paper towel or baby wipe. Great for protecting baby pillow from spills, drool, diaper leaks, or dirt.

QUALITY GUARANTEE - Bebenapnap baby pillow wedge is made from the HIGHEST QUALITY materials. Memory foam is designed to remain firm and keep its integrity for years! Our baby crib pillow comes with an anti-slip non-rip toxin free waterproof easy to clean cover that protects the memory foam from any damage or spills. Our high-quality bamboo cotton cover is extremely soft to the touch, thick quality material that is easy to remove and throw into the washing machine, made to last for years!
